1.title: São Paulo
1.plot: Carey explores the markets by day and São Paulo's packed local bars by night, before heading to one of the country's best beaches to mix some drinks.

2.title: Sydney
2.plot: Carey gets a taste of the best food and drink that Sydney has to offer, including a restaurant that's only accessible by seaplane. Plus, he tries his hand at some spearfishing and things get...interesting.

3.title: Taipei
3.plot: Nick Wu, Taiwan's Best Bartender 2016, introduces Carey to bustling Taipei. First, an exploration of the night markets to experience local delicacies, then they venture out into the mountains to collect tea leaves with a Tea Master, creating delicious drinks to accompany some classic Taiwanese cuisine.

4.title: Berlin
4.plot: Berlin may have a reputation as a clubbing hotspot, but rising star of the bartending scene, Arash Ghassemi, introduces Carey to another side of the city. Using beans sourced from a local roastery they create coffee cocktails by day and discover Berlin's best bars by night. Arash also takes Carey to meet his mentor and experience the true craft of mixing flavours.

5.title: London
5.plot: Bar owner and author, Tristan Stephenson, leads Carey through historical London, foraging for fresh garnishes, learning about the history of Gin, Whisky tasting on a 185 year old oak tree and drinking a serve made from wood ants. All topped off with a classic martini at officially the best bar in the world.

6.title: Barcelona
6.plot: Carey heads into the heart of Barcelona with Spain's best bartender of 2016 Adriana Chia, who introduces him to the city's love affair with food and drink pairings. From heading above the clouds to watch the sunrise to embracing local traditions with an ice-cold Christmas swim, Barcelona is full of new experiences.

7.title: San Francisco
7.plot: United States' Best Bartender 2016, Andrew Meltzer, shows Carey around laid-back San Francisco. Scouting out fresh seafood at the market and heading to a Tiki bar with a floating live band is what this city's all about. Although, seeing in the New Year by boat as fireworks light up the skyline takes the trip to a whole new level.

8.title: Mexico City
8.plot: Carey discovers Mexico City with Mexico's Best Bartender 2016, Mica Rousseau. The two head into the ring for a lesson in Lucha Libre and explore the local markets to prepare for a masterclass in Mexican food and drink. Carey also gets involved and creates a serve for his host using the skills he's picked up from the best.

locations: Guilhotina Bar, Pinheiros , Brazil::(Sao Paolo Bar)
Dead Ringer, Surrey Hills, New South Wales, Australia::(Sydney Bar)
Bulletin Place, Circular Quay, Sydney, Australia::(Sydney Bar)
East End, Da'an District, Taipei City, Taiwan::(Taipei Bar)
Monkey Bar, Tiergarten, Berlin, Germany::(Berlin Bar)
Schwarze Traube, Kreuzberg, Berlin, Germany::(Berlin Bar)
Dandelyan, The Mondrian, South Bank, London, UK::(London Bar)
Black Rock, Shoreditch, London, UK::(London Bar)
American Bar, The Savoy, Strand, London, UK::(London Bar)
imdb.plot outline: Travelling the world is a dream come true, but there's a job to be done: discover the ultimate drinks experiences. On his mission, Carey explores each city - steps off the tourist path and sees the area through a local's eyes - guided by our World Class bartenders. Whether foraging for garnishes or enjoying a martini at the best bar in the world, each trip culminates in a drink that represents the city.
imdb.title: World Class List
plot: Join Carey Watkins as he meets some of the world's best bartenders, and gets an insider's view on what, where and how to drink better.

Travelling the world is a dream come true, but there's a job to be done: discover the ultimate drinks experiences. On his mission, Carey explores each city - steps off the tourist path and sees the area through a local's eyes - guided by our World Class bartenders. Whether foraging for garnishes or enjoying a martini at the best bar in the world, each trip culminates in a drink that represents the city.
